definition[0]: careful to avoid danger or risks
example[1]: a cautious approach to the crisis
example[2]: The air-pollution board has reacted with cautious optimism to the announcement.
example[3]: Keller is cautious about making predictions for the success of the program.
definition[1]: if buyers or investors are cautious, they are unwilling to buy because they feel uncertain about the future
example[4]: Seoul investors turned cautious about the marketâ€™s rapid rises last week, and share prices ended lower.
